items.sentence: Tom had completely forgotten that he was naked.
Tom had enough time to do what he needed to do.
Do you agree with what Tom wrote in his report?
Let\'s hope Tom will have the sense to do that.
Tom, I want you to know that you\'re not alone.
Tom only earns half as much money as Mary does.
Tom persuaded Mary to go to the party with him.
Tom put all his belongings in a small suitcase.
Tom didn\'t know that Mary was studying French.
Tom didn\'t know whether Mary liked him or not.
